abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Public Financial
            Management Reform Project for Vietnam is to strengthen the
            recipient's capacity to plan, execute, and report on
            its budget and to improve the transparency and
            accountability of the budgetary systems and processes. The
            closing date of the project will be extended from February
            28, 2013 to October 31, 2013. The extension is necessary to
            ensure successful hand-over of the treasury and budget
            management information system (TABMIS) from the contractor
            to the Ministry of Finance (MoF) and complete the remaining
            critical activities. Reallocation will bring the following
            changes: (1) delivering TABMIS under a turn-key contract
            covering both goods and operating costs; and (2) utilizing
            the remaining fund to meet the additional consultancy and
            training needs in order to fully achieve the objectives of
            the project.
